General.Name: Hakers Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Hakers Enterprise Co., Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and markets garments and other related textile products in Taiwan. It offers sportswear products, including swim trunks, shorts, jackets, and trousers. Hakers Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1986 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 6, Jung-shing Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 24872
